Title: Men, Women & Children
Writer: Chad Kultgen (based on the novel by), Jason Reitman (screenplay by), Erin Cressida Wilson (screenplay by)
Actors: Adam Sandler, Jennifer Garner, Rosemarie DeWitt, Judy Greer
Plot: A group of high school teenagers and their parents attempt to navigate the many ways the Internet has changed their relationships, their communications, their self-images, and their love lives.
